tika-vin10t7:14_0: Chādentī bhikkhunī vajjaṁ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:15_0: Jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ, chādentī sā parājikā.
tika-vin10t7:26_0: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:30_0: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ, samaṇī sā parājitā.
tika-vin10t7:42_0: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gacche, gamane dukkaṭaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:49_0: Āpattīnaṁ pabhede tu, kāci natthi visesatā.
tika-vin10t7:60_0: ‘‘Sahatthena gahetvā tvaṁ, khāda vā bhuñja vā’’tipi;
tika-vin10t7:61_0: Uyyojentī panevaṁ tu, tisso āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t7:67_0: Uyyojeti ca yā tassā, imā tissoti dīpaye.
tika-vin10t7:69_0: Sattame aṭṭhame cāpi, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t7:74_0: Ekaṁ nissaggiyaṁyeva, phuse pācittiyaṁ tu sā.
tika-vin10t7:77_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, lābhe nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:80_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ, chinne, tassā nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:82_0: Viññāpetvāva aññaṁ ce, viññāpeti tato paraṁ;
tika-vin10t7:85_0: Cetāpetvā hi aññaṁ ce, cetāpeti tato paraṁ;
tika-vin10t7:88_0: Evameva ca sesesu, chaṭṭhādīsu ca sattasu;
tika-vin10t7:92_0: Lasuṇaṁ khādati dve ce, dukkaṭaṁ gahaṇe siyā;
tika-vin10t7:95_0: Saṁharāpentiyā lomaṁ, sambādhe dveva honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:96_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, hoti pācitti saṁhaṭe.
tika-vin10t7:98_0: Karontī talaghātaṁ tu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:99_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, kate pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:101_0: Jatunā maṭṭhakaṁ kiñci, sādiyantī duve phuse;
tika-vin10t7:108_0: Hatthapāse tu pācitti, hitvā tiṭṭhati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:113_0: Uccārādiṁ tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍentī dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t7:114_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:117_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ tassā, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:123_0: Paṭhame dutiye ceva, tatiye ca catutthake;
tika-vin10t7:127_0: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, pakkamantī duve phuse.
tika-vin10t7:132_0: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, āsane ce nisīdati;
tika-vin10t7:133_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, pācitti ca nisīdite.
tika-vin10t7:135_0: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṁ sabbaṁ, samānaṁ aṭṭhame pana;
tika-vin10t7:141_0: Vadhitvā pana attānaṁ, rodantī tu duve phuse;
tika-vin10t7:142_0: Vadhati rodati pācitti, karotekaṁ tu dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:145_0: Naggā nhāyati dve ceva, payoge dukkaṭaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:151_0: Cīvaraṁ tu visibbetvā, visibbāpetva vā pana;
tika-vin10t7:157_0: Sace saṅkamanīyaṁ tu, dhāreti pana cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t7:158_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, pācitti pana dhārite.
tika-vin10t7:161_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, kate pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:177_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ tāsaṁ, nipanne itaraṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:180_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, kate pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:185_0: Sace upassayaṁ datvā, nikkaḍḍhati ca bhikkhuniṁ;
tika-vin10t7:186_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ tassā, hoti pācitti kaḍḍhite.
tika-vin10t7:188_0: Chaṭṭhe pana ca saṁsaṭṭhā, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:191_0: Antoraṭṭhe tu sāsaṅke, cārikaṁ tu carantiyā;
tika-vin10t7:199_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ tassā, pācitti yadi passati.
tika-vin10t7:202_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, bhutte pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:204_0: Suttaṁ kantantiyā dveva, payoge dukkaṭaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t7:207_0: Veyyāvaccaṁ gihīnaṁ tu, dveva honti karontiyā;
tika-vin10t7:208_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, kate pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:211_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ chaṭṭhe, dinne pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:214_0: Aṭṭhamaṁ dutiye vagge, pañcamena samaṁ mataṁ.
tika-vin10t7:217_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, pācitti hi pade pade.
tika-vin10t7:227_0: Dukkaṭaṁ piṭake vuttaṁ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t7:229_0: Akkosati ca yā bhikkhuṁ, bhikkhunī paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t7:232_0: Yā hi caṇḍikabhāvena, gaṇaṁ tu paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t7:236_0: Bhuñjantī bhikkhunī sā hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t7:241_0: Kulaṁ tu maccharāyantī, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:242_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, sesā maccharite siyā.
tika-vin10t7:250_0: Ovādatthāya vā bhikkhuṁ, saṁvāsatthāya vā tathā;
tika-vin10t7:251_0: Na gacchati sace tassā, ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:253_0: Ovādampi na yācantī, na gacchantī uposathaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:260_0: Gabbhiniṁ vuṭṭhapentī hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:277_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ, pacchā, hoti pācitti khīyite.
tika-vin10t7:279_0: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t7:284_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, hoti pācitti dhārite.
tika-vin10t7:286_0: Yānena pana yāyantī, dve kirāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t7:287_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, pācitti yadi yāyite.
tika-vin10t7:289_0: Dhārentiyā tu saṅghāṇiṁ, payoge dukkaṭaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:290_0: Dhārite pana pācitti, catutthepi ayaṁ nayo.
tika-vin10t7:296_0: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca.
tika-vin10t7:301_0: Anāpucchā tu bhikkhussa, purato yā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t7:302_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ tassā, pācitti tu nisīdite.
tika-vin10t7:305_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṁ hoti, vuttā pācitti pucchite.
tika-vin10t7:315_0: Tato bhikkhuniyā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:334_0: Jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:335_0: Cutā, thullaccayaṁ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t7:337_0: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṁ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t7:338_0: Attano pana duṭṭhullaṁ, chādento dukkaṭaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:349_0: Accajaṁ pāpikaṁ diṭṭhiṁ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:362_0: Bhikkhunī tu sace hoti, pāṭidesaniyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:364_0: Ājīvahetu sūpaṁ vā, odanaṁ vā panattano;
tika-vin10t7:387_0: Jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:388_0: Cutā, thullaccayaṁ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t7:390_0: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṁ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t7:399_0: Thullaccayaṁ dvayaṁ dvīhi, kammavācāhi sā phuse;
tika-vin10t7:403_0: Na pariccajati taṁ laddhiṁ, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t7:413_0: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, kati āpattiyo siyuṁ?
tika-vin10t7:414_0: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, dve panāpattiyo siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t7:417_0: Hoti pācittiyaṁ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:428_0: Hoti pācittiyaṁ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:433_0: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, khandhake tu pavāraṇe?
tika-vin10t7:436_0: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, camme? Tissova dīpitā;
tika-vin10t7:437_0: Mārentānaṁ tu pācitti, gahetvā vacchatariṁ pana.
tika-vin10t7:440_0: Tassa thullaccayaṁ vuttaṁ, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:448_0: Kathine natthi āpatti, paññattaṁ kevalaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t7:463_0: Chandassa dāyako bhikkhu, pācitti yadi khīyati;
tika-vin10t7:469_0: Attano aṅgajātaṁ tu, chindaṁ thullaccayaṁ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:470_0: Romanthe hoti pācitti, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:472_0: Tathā senāsanasmiṁ tu, tisso āpattiyo siyuṁ;
tika-vin10t7:506_0: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi, tīhi vātha catūhi vā;
tika-vin10t7:509_0: Tattha pañcasamuṭṭhānā, kā cāpatti na vijjati;
tika-vin10t7:519_0: Pacchimehi ca tīheva, samuṭṭhāti na aññato.
tika-vin10t7:543_0: Tattha yā tu catutthena, samuṭṭhānena jāyate;
tika-vin10t7:582_0: Paṭhamaṁ dutiyaṁ tattha, catutthaṁ navamampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:589_0: Sabhojane, raho dve ca, aṅgulī, udake hasaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:591_0: Pahāre, uggire ceva, tepaññāsā ca sekhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:613_0: Ukkoṭanaṁ =00 tathā ūno, saṁvāso, nāsanena ca;
tika-vin10t7:617_0: Kiṁ te, akālaṁ, acchinde, duggahā, nirayena vā.
tika-vin10t7:619_0: Gaṇassa ca vibhaṅgañca, dubbalāsā tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t7:622_0: Sayaṁ upassayaṁ datvā, akkoseyya ca caṇḍikā;
tika-vin10t7:625_0: Pāyantiṁ, dve ca vassāni, saṅghenāsammatampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:628_0: Ūnadvādasavassā dve, tathālaṁ tāva teti ca;
tika-vin10t7:647_0: Pūvehi, paccayo jotiṁ, ratanaṁ, sūci, mañcakaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:648_0: Tūlaṁ, nisīdanaṁ, kaṇḍu, vassikā, sugatassa ca.
tika-vin10t7:651_0: Saṅghikena duve vuttā, dve mahājanikena ca.
tika-vin10t7:663_0: Appasaddā duve vuttā, tathā na byāhareti ca;
tika-vin10t7:664_0: Chamā, nīcāsane, ṭhānaṁ, pacchato, uppathena ca.
tika-vin10t7:667_0: Paccakkhāmīti sikkhā ca, tathā kismiñcideva ca.
tika-vin10t7:669_0: Saṁsaṭṭhā dve, vadhitvā ca, visibbetvā ca dukkhitaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:670_0: Punadeva ca saṁsaṭṭhā, neva vūpasameyya ca.
tika-vin10t7:675_0: Sace me cīvaraṁ ayye, anubandhissasīti ca;
tika-vin10t7:682_0: Kathināni ca tīṇādi, patto, bhesajjameva ca;
tika-vin10t7:705_0: Naggaṁ, attharaṇaṁ, mañce, antoraṭṭhe, tathā bahi.
tika-vin10t7:708_0: Veyyāvaccaṁ, sahatthā ca, āvāse ca abhikkhuke.
tika-vin10t7:720_0: Sabbe cha panime dhammā, vācato vācacittato;
tika-vin10t7:727_0: Etā =03 catusamuṭṭhānā, sikkhā cuddasa honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:732_0: Paṭicchanne ca okāse, byūhe cāti ime chapi.
tika-vin10t7:751_0: Pañca āpattiyo honti, kuṭiṁ saṁyācikāya tu.
tika-vin10t7:759_0: Kati =04 āpattiyo honti, dutiyena tuvaṁ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:763_0: Karonti ce kuṭiṁ tassa, vipannaṁ sabbathā pana.
tika-vin10t7:768_0: Tatiyena kati jāyanti, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:779_0: Siyuṁ kati catutthena, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:782_0: Hoti pārājikaṁ tassa, kuṭiṁ saṁyācikāya tu;
tika-vin10t7:788_0: Kati āpattiyo honti, pañcamena? Cha honti hi;
tika-vin10t7:796_0: Vāceti padaso dhammaṁ, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t7:800_0: Cha ca saṁvidahitvāna, bhaṇḍaṁ harati ce cuto.
tika-vin10t7:820_0: Kā panāpattiyo nāma, lahukā garukāpi kā?
tika-vin10t7:823_0: Duṭṭhullā nāma kāpatti, aduṭṭhullāpi nāma kā?
tika-vin10t7:825_0: Niyatā nāma kāpatti, kā panāniyatāpi ca?
tika-vin10t7:850_0: Bhikkhū ca bhabbā atha bhikkhunī ca.
tika-vin10t7:875_0: Kathañhi =07 bhaṇato saccaṁ, garukaṁ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t7:881_0: Kathaṁ musā bhaṇantassa, garukaṁ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t7:882_0: Kathañca bhaṇato saccaṁ, āpatti lahukā siyā?
tika-vin10t7:887_0: Kathaṁ bhūmigato dosaṁ, na vehāsagato phuse?
tika-vin10t7:888_0: Kathaṁ vehāsago dosaṁ, na ca bhūmigato phuse?
tika-vin10t7:896_0: Pavisanto kathaṁ bhikkhu, āpajjati, na nikkhamaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:897_0: Pavisanto kathaṁ bhikkhu, pavisanto na ceva taṁ?
tika-vin10t7:903_0: Nikkhamantova āpattiṁ, phuseyya, pavisaṁ na ca.
tika-vin10t7:912_0: Yevaṁ anādiyantova, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:918_0: Samādiyanto āpattiṁ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:920_0: Yo hi kammakato bhikkhu, vuttaṁ vattaṁ panattano;
tika-vin10t7:924_0: Na karonto kathaṁ nāma, samaṇo dosavā siyā?
tika-vin10t7:930_0: Akaronto panāpattiṁ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:932_0: Dento āpajjatāpattiṁ, na dentopi kathaṁ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:933_0: Aññātikāya yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t7:935_0: Cīvaraṁ dadamāno hi, dento āpajjate pana;
tika-vin10t7:945_0: Ovādañca na gaṇhanto, āpajjati hi vajjataṁ.
tika-vin10t7:950_0: Yo hi nissaggiyaṁ vatthuṁ, accajitvā nisevati;
tika-vin10t7:951_0: Ayaṁ tu paribhogena, āpajjati, na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:954_0: Ayaṁ tu paribhogena, āpajjati hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t7:956_0: Divāpajjati no rattiṁ, rattimeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t7:959_0: Sagāraseyyakaṁ =09 rattiṁ, āpajjati hi no divā;
tika-vin10t7:971_0: Na chindanto nakhe kese, āpajjati hi nāma so;
tika-vin10t7:977_0: Āpajjati hi dhārento, na dhārento kathaṁ pana?
tika-vin10t7:984_0: Atthāpatti hi tiṭṭhante, nāthe, no parinibbute;
tika-vin10t7:990_0: Āpattiyo imā dvepi, ṭhapetvā sugate pana;
tika-vin10t7:993_0: Kāleyeva siyāpatti, vikāle na siyā kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:994_0: Vikāle tu siyāpatti, na kāle, ubhayatthapi?
tika-vin10t7:1000_0: Sabbaṁ kāle vikāle ca, natthi tattha ca saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1002_0: Rattimeva panāpattiṁ, āpajjati ca no divā;
tika-vin10t7:1006_0: Divā, sesā panāpatti, siyā rattiṁ divāpi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1008_0: Dasavasso tu no ūna-dasavasso siyā kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1012_0: Āpattiṁ pana abyatto, āpajjati, na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1017_0: Kāḷe āpajjatāpattiṁ, na juṇhe juṇhake kathaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1020_0: Vassaṁ anupagacchanto, kāḷe, no juṇhake pana;
tika-vin10t7:1024_0: Kāḷe ceva ca juṇhe ca, āpajjati, na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1026_0: Vassūpagamanaṁ kāḷe, no juṇhe, tu pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t7:1027_0: Juṇhe kappati, no kāḷe, sesaṁ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t7:1030_0: Gimheyeva na sesesu, vasse no itaradvaye.
tika-vin10t7:1035_0: Āpajjati ca hemante, nivāseti ca taṁ sace;
tika-vin10t7:1047_0: Ovassāpeti yo kāyaṁ, vasse āpajjatīdha so.
tika-vin10t7:1049_0: Āpajjati hi saṅghova, na gaṇo na ca puggalo;
tika-vin10t7:1050_0: Gaṇova na ca sesā hi, puggalova na cāpare.
tika-vin10t7:1053_0: Saṅgho vāpajjatāpattiṁ, na gaṇo na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:1056_0: Gaṇo vāpajjatāpattiṁ, na saṅgho na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:1058_0: Suttuddesaṁ karonto vā, eko pana uposathaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1059_0: Puggalopajjatāpattiṁ, na ca saṅgho gaṇo na ca.
tika-vin10t7:1064_0: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t7:1067_0: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṁ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1070_0: Atthāpatti hi antova, na bahiddhā, tathā bahi;
tika-vin10t7:1073_0: Anupakhajja seyyaṁ tu, kappento pana kevalaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1074_0: Āpajjati panāpattiṁ, antoyeva ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t7:1077_0: Bahiyeva ca, no anto, sesaṁ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t7:1132_0: Āpanno paṭibuddhova, sutto sujjhati so kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1138_0: Desento pana taṁ ñatvā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1141_0: Samathe tu sayantova, sutto vuṭṭhāti nāma so.
tika-vin10t7:1147_0: Desento pana taṁ pacchā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1156_0: Pacchā taṁ pana desento, sacittova visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1171_0: Desento pana taṁ pacchā, akammena visujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1180_0: Desento pana taṁ pacchā, akammeneva sujjhati.
tika-vin10t7:1189_0: Vuṭṭhānakāle saṅghena, kiñci kammaṁ na vijjati.
tika-vin10t7:1198_0: Taṁ pacchā pana desento, visujjhati asammukhā.
tika-vin10t7:1213_0: Atthāpatti ca sesaṁ tu, ubho nāpajjare pana.
tika-vin10t7:1216_0: Vihāraṁ pavisanto ca, vicarantopi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t7:1233_0: Samaṇo samaṇī kāya-saṁsaggaṁ tu karonti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1237_0: Kāyassa pana saṁsaggo, ubhinnaṁ vatthu hoti hi.
tika-vin10t7:1240_0: Āpajjati hi pācittiṁ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:1278_0: Upajjhāyo phuse vajjaṁ, na ca saddhivihāriko.
tika-vin10t7:1283_0: Sesaṁ panidha āpattiṁ, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1286_0: Ādiyanto garuṁ dosaṁ, payojento lahuṁ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:1287_0: Ādiyanto lahuṁ dosaṁ, payojento garuṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:1292_0: Pādaṁ vāpi tato uddhaṁ, ādiyanto garuṁ phuse;
tika-vin10t7:1298_0: Kāleyeva panāpatti, no vikāle kathaṁ siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1299_0: Vikāleyeva āpatti, na ca kāle kathaṁ siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1301_0: Atthāpatti hi kāle ca, vikāle ca pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t7:1302_0: Neva kāle vikāle ca, atthāpatti pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t7:1308_0: Sesaṁ kāle vikāle ca, āpajjati, na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1313_0: Kiṁ paṭiggahitaṁ kāle, no vikāle tu kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1314_0: Vikāle kiñca no kāle, gahitaṁ pana kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1316_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kiṁ nāma vada kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1317_0: Neva kāle ca kiṁ nāma, no vikāle ca kappati?
tika-vin10t7:1320_0: Kāleyeva tu bhikkhūnaṁ, no vikāle tu kappati.
tika-vin10t7:1323_0: Vikāleyeva kāle ca, aparajju na kappati.
tika-vin10t7:1326_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kappatīti viniddise.
tika-vin10t7:1332_0: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:1335_0: Majjhime pana desasmiṁ, na ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t7:1340_0: Sīmaṁ samudde bandhanto, bhikkhu paccantimesu hi;
tika-vin10t7:1346_0: Dhārento majjhime vajjaṁ, phuse paccantimesu no;
tika-vin10t7:1350_0: Paccantimesu vā bhikkhu, nāpajjati na majjhime.
tika-vin10t7:1352_0: Paccantimesu desesu, kappate na ca majjhime;
tika-vin10t7:1353_0: Kappate, majjhime dese, no ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t7:1356_0: Paccantimesu cevāpi, kiṁ na kappati majjhime?
tika-vin10t7:1359_0: Niddise kappatī ceva, na ca kappati majjhime.
tika-vin10t7:1364_0: Paccantimesu desesu, evaṁ vuttaṁ na kappati;
tika-vin10t7:1368_0: Ubhayatthapi taṁ sabbaṁ, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:1370_0: Anto āpajjatāpattiṁ, āpajjati ca, no bahi;
tika-vin10t7:1371_0: Bahi āpajjatāpattiṁ, na ca anto kudācanaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:1374_0: Neva anto ca āpattiṁ, āpajjati ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t7:1377_0: Saṅghikaṁ pana mañcādiṁ, ajjhokāse tu kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t7:1379_0: Nikkhipitvāna gacchanto, no anto, bahiyeva ca;
tika-vin10t7:1385_0: Gāme āpajjatāpattiṁ, no araññe kathaṁ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1386_0: Āpajjati araññasmiṁ, na ca gāme kathaṁ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1388_0: Āpajjati ca gāmepi, araññepi kathaṁ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1389_0: Nevāpajjati gāmepi, no araññe kathaṁ vada?
tika-vin10t7:1392_0: Āpajjati hi taṁ bhikkhu, gāmasmiṁ, no araññake.
tika-vin10t7:1394_0: Agaṇā aruṇaṁ nāma, uṭṭhāpentī ca bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:1395_0: Āpajjati panāpattiṁ, araññe, no ca gāmake.
tika-vin10t7:1401_0: Agilānova āpattiṁ, phuse, no ca gilānako.
tika-vin10t7:1403_0: Agilāno gilāno ca, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1404_0: Nāpajjanti gilāno ca, agilāno ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1406_0: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t7:1409_0: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṁ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t7:1422_0: Yo tattha cīvaruppādo, so ca nesaṁ bhavissati;
tika-vin10t7:1429_0: Gadrabhassa vasā ceti, vasā pañcavidhā matā.
tika-vin10t7:1472_0: Āpattiṁ pana jānāti, anāpattiṁ garuṁ lahuṁ.
tika-vin10t7:1481_0: Satta sāmīciyo vuttā, satteva samathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1486_0: Pupphena ca phalenāpi, cuṇṇenapi ca dūsako.
tika-vin10t7:1494_0: Kataṁ ahatthapāsepi, na ca bhuttāvinā kataṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1507_0: Iti aṭṭhavidhaṁ hoti, sabbameva ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:1524_0: Musā na bhāse, na ca majjapo siyā;
tika-vin10t7:1528_0: Mālaṁ na dhāre, na ca gandhamācare;
tika-vin10t7:1538_0: Dukkaṭaṁ pana niddiṭṭhaṁ, nava maṁsāni khādato.
tika-vin10t7:1545_0: Akappiyāni maṁsāni, dasa sukkāni ve dasa.
tika-vin10t7:1547_0: Jāti nāmañca gottañca, kammaṁ sippañca rogatā;
tika-vin10t7:1548_0: Liṅgāpatti kilesā ca, akkosena daseva hi.
tika-vin10t7:1553_0: Dasa kammapathā puññā, apuññāpi tathā dasa;
tika-vin10t7:1575_0: Pattā akappiyā vuttā, ekādasa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:1588_0: Gaṇṭhikā kappiyā vuttā, ekādasa ca vīdhakā.
tika-vin10t7:1599_0: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṁ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t7:1612_0: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t7:1616_0: Ito paraṁ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṁ suṇataṁ puna;
tika-vin10t7:1620_0: Paṭicca methunaṁ dhammaṁ, kathaṁ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1623_0: Mukhena methunaṁ dhammaṁ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t7:1625_0: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t7:1628_0: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t7:1631_0: Sayaṁ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t7:1638_0: Parassa tu parikkhāraṁ, na ca pārājiko kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1641_0: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t7:1643_0: Attano santakaṁ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1646_0: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t7:1647_0: Hantvānantariyaṁ kammaṁ, na phuseyya kathaṁ naro?
tika-vin10t7:1653_0: Gacchaṁ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṁ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:1659_0: Kathaṁ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t7:1665_0: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṁ, vattaṁ so vuṭṭhito kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1675_0: Vaṇṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṁ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t7:1678_0: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṁ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t7:1681_0: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṁ ghasati bhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1684_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1685_0: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṁ bhave?
tika-vin10t7:1688_0: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t7:1690_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṁ paresaṁ mamāyitaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1691_0: Na harantova taṁ theyyā, kathaṁ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1696_0: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t7:1697_0: Methunaṁ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1702_0: Ekissā dve siyuṁ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t7:1703_0: Dvinnaṁ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṁ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t7:1706_0: Gaṇhāpeti paraṁ gabbhaṁ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t7:1712_0: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṁ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t7:1714_0: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṁ gato;
tika-vin10t7:1715_0: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t7:1718_0: Na so labhati aññesaṁ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t7:1721_0: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t7:1724_0: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t7:1729_0: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṁ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1730_0: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t7:1743_0: Parassā pana yā vajjaṁ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t7:1751_0: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t7:1754_0: Anuggiraṁ giraṁ kiñci, subhaṁ vā yadi vāsubhaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1755_0: Phuse vācasikaṁ vajjaṁ, kathaṁ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t7:1769_0: Saṁvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṁ theniṁsu bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1770_0: Thero thullaccayaṁ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:1772_0: Kathaṁ ? Chamāsakaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t7:1773_0: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t7:1780_0: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṁ gatā;
tika-vin10t7:1781_0: Chiddaṁ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t7:1786_0: Sappiādiṁ tu bhesajjaṁ, gahetvā sāmameva taṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1793_0: Ekatova kathaṁ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t7:1795_0: Saṅghe pariṇataṁ lābhaṁ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t7:1809_0: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṁ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t7:1811_0: Kaṇṇaṁ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṁ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t7:1814_0: Purisaṁ apitaraṁ hantvā, itthiṁ hantvā amātaraṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1817_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṁ, pitaraṁ itthitaṁ gataṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1818_0: Mātaraṁ purisattaṁ tu, gataṁ hantvā garuṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:1820_0: Mātaraṁ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:1826_0: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṁ, saṅgho kammaṁ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t7:1827_0: Kathaṁ kammaṁ akammaṁ taṁ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t7:1841_0: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1856_0: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t7:1863_0: Nānitthīnaṁ tu kese vā, tāsaṁ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t7:1864_0: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t7:1875_0: Methunaṁ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t7:1880_0: Mātaraṁ cīvaraṁ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṁ na ca;
tika-vin10t7:1881_0: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t7:1897_0: Ekassa kammaṁ tu na rūhate kiṁ?
tika-vin10t7:1904_0: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:1905_0: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṁ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t7:1907_0: Na ca kappakataṁ vatthaṁ, na ca rattaṁ akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1911_0: Na cassākappiyaṁ nāma, cīvaraṁ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t7:1913_0: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t7:1914_0: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t7:1932_0: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṁ, kathaṁ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t7:1938_0: Dvijaṁ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t7:1958_0: Nidānaṁ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṁ puraṁ;
tika-vin10t7:1961_0: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t7:1965_0: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṁ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t7:1970_0: Cha panāḷaviyaṁ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṁ katā;
tika-vin10t7:1971_0: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t7:1977_0: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṁ katā.
tika-vin10t7:1988_0: Vosāsantī ca naccaṁ vā, gītaṁ vā cārikadvayaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2001_0: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṁ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t7:2013_0: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t7:2016_0: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṁ katā.
tika-vin10t7:2021_0: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t7:2022_0: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t7:2027_0: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṁ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t7:2028_0: Bhikkhunīnaṁ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2031_0: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṁsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2033_0: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t7:2036_0: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t7:2039_0: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t7:2040_0: Nissaggiyāni tiṁseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t7:2043_0: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t7:2045_0: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṁ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t7:2051_0: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t7:2052_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t7:2058_0: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2063_0: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṁ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t7:2084_0: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṁ tiṁsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:2088_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t7:2090_0: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṁ tiṁsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t7:2106_0: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṁ tiṁsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t7:2109_0: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t7:2114_0: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṁ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t7:2128_0: Ito paraṁ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṁ pana sabbagaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2129_0: Savane sādaraṁ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t7:2140_0: Puggalo nāma yaṁ yaṁ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2141_0: Sikkhāpadaṁ tu paññattaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t7:2147_0: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṁsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t7:2149_0: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t7:2152_0: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t7:2177_0: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t7:2182_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t7:2191_0: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t7:2208_0: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2219_0: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṁ akusalaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t7:2259_0: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t7:2262_0: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2263_0: Kati thullaccayaṁ maṁse, kati maṁsesu dukkaṭaṁ?
tika-vin10t7:2268_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ, saṁvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2274_0: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ, saṁvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2275_0: Abhirūhati nāvaṁ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t7:2278_0: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2280_0: Kati vācasikā rattiṁ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t7:2281_0: Duve vācasikā rattiṁ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t7:2293_0: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t7:2296_0: Manussassa visaṁ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t7:2297_0: Hoti pārājikaṁ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṁ mataṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2300_0: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2314_0: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t7:2318_0: Ratticchedo katīnaṁ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2321_0: Ratticchedo duvinnaṁ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t7:2324_0: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t7:2335_0: Dvaṅgulaṁ vā dumāsaṁ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t7:2338_0: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t7:2346_0: Pārājikaṁ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṁ mate.
tika-vin10t7:2358_0: Dukkaṭaṁ pana niddiṭṭhaṁ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t7:2361_0: Dvīhi thullaccayaṁ vuttaṁ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2367_0: Bhūtagāmaṁ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṁ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t7:2369_0: Visaṁ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t7:2370_0: Pārājikaṁ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t7:2375_0: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t7:2381_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ, saṁvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t7:2388_0: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t7:2394_0: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t7:2405_0: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t7:2415_0: Gahetvā bhojanaṁ kiñci, sabbaṁ maṁsaṁ akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2427_0: Olokentassa vā vuttaṁ, mukhaṁ bhikkhaṁ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t7:2438_0: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t7:2442_0: Dve tayo anusāvetuṁ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t7:2444_0: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t7:2454_0: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t7:2466_0: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṁ thullaccayaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t7:2468_0: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṁ tu, bhojanaṁ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t7:2471_0: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṁ vā, odanaṁ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t7:2472_0: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2487_0: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t7:2497_0: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t7:2498_0: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t7:2509_0: Vāceti ca paraṁ niccaṁ, atthaṁ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t7:2511_0: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t7:2537_0: Rājā pātu mahiṁ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t7:2539_0: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t7:2551_0: Akāsiṁ paramaṁ etaṁ, uttaraṁ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t7:2552_0: Savane sādaraṁ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṁ.
tika-vin10t7:2559_1: kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo
